hibernate-mapping.sql-query: from MultiOrgOption e where e.isEnable = 1 and (e.systemUnitId = :systemUnitId or e.systemUnitId= :ptSystemUnitId) <if isNotBlank( value )> and (e.name like '%${value}%' or e.id like '%${value}%' or e.code like '%${value}%') </if>
from MultiOrgOption e where (e.systemUnitId = :systemUnitId or e.systemUnitId= :ptSystemUnitId) and e.id in (:ids)

select t.* from MULTI_ORG_OPTION t where 1 = 1 <if isNotBlank( keyword )> and ( t.name like '%${keyword}%' or t.id like '%${keyword}%' or t.code like '%${keyword}%' ) </if> <if isNotBlank( orderBy )> ${orderBy} </if>
